articles.description: Reaction to Tottenham v Qarabag and Malmo v Rangers in the Europa League plus Premier League news conferences.
articles.title: Europa League reaction: Rangers and 10-man Tottenham win openers

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Maximo Park frontman Paul Smith with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v Maximo Park frontman Paul Smith

articles.description: Qarabag manager Gurban Gurbanov says his team were not given enough time to prepare after being stuck in traffic for two and a half hours en route to Thursday's Europa League match at Tottenham.
articles.title: Tottenham 3-0 Qarabag: 'Stuck for two and a half hours' - visitors suffer European nightmare

articles.description: Dak Prescott throws two touchdown passes as the Dallas Cowboys' hot streak against the New York Giants continues.
articles.title: New York Giants 15-20 Dallas Cowboys: Dak Prescott inspires much-needed win

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler and South Korea’s Tom Kim are involved in a spat as the United States sweep to a 5-0 Presidents Cup lead over the International team.
articles.title: Presidents Cup: Scottie Scheffler & Tom Kim in spat as US lead 5-0

articles.description: Premier League club Arsenal has forged a deep connection with black culture and identity which goes far beyond sport.
articles.title: How Arsenal became synonymous with black identity and culture

articles.description: West Indies legend Dwayne Bravo, 40, brings forward his retirement after picking up a groin injury.
articles.title: Dwayne Bravo: West Indies legend announces retirement from cricket

articles.description: Newcastle United chief executive Darren Eales is to step down from his position after being diagnosed with a chronic form of blood cancer, the club says.
articles.title: Darren Eales: Newcastle United chief executive to step down after cancer diagnosis

articles.description: Daniel Ricciardo is replaced at RB by Liam Lawson for the remainder of the 2024 season.
articles.title: Daniel Ricciardo replaced at RB by Liam Lawson for remainder of 2024 Formula 1 season

articles.description: British coach Aden Durde is making a positive start to life in Seattle after being tasked with rebuilding the Seahawks' defence.
articles.title: Seattle Seahawks: British NFL coach Aden Durde on helping build new 'Legion of Boom'
